version_description:
* Ableton Live Set export
* One-shot sample playback
* Reverse mode
* Setting for latched recording mode
* Setting for pitch snap to semitone
* Improved bass synth sound
* Effects have move even volumes
* Batch export all loops
* Performance and stability improvements

* Samples can be recorded in mono or stereo
* Drag samples and sequences across banks with one finger
* Full IAA and AudioBus input and output (and clock sync)
* Upside-down portrait mode enabled
* All audio is stored and rendered in 24 bit
* Fixes issues with long sequences

* Now comes with a free copy of Ableton Live Lite!
* Settings allow choosing which midi channel to listen on
* Press DOUBLE UP to duplicate your loop
* You can drag sequences to a bin
* Better Ableton Link support
* Better IAA sync

* Made Ableton Live Lite install button easier to find (bottom of menu).
* Now you can sample via IAA MIDI

* Background audio switch in settings
* Auto-save fixed
* Now FX are saved with song if hold is on
* Stability and performance

* 8 brand new mix FX! - Cutter, Reverse, Dub, Tempo Delay, Talkbox, VibroFlange, Dirty, Compressor
* Gate effect fixed
* Prompt that reminds you to save before starting a new song or loading another
* Other performance / stability enhancements

- Pinch to zoom waveforms
- Crop samples
- Share koala songs
- Better midi support
- Optimization and small bug fixes

- Landscape mode for iPad
- Attack and release envelope controls
- Loop mode for samples
- per sample tone control
- improved stability and efficiency

- now compatible with split view on iPad
- fixes exporting bug

- fixed a bug with oneshot reverse
- other stability/performance issues

- export stems, both as files or in ableton sets
- merge samples by dropping them on each other
- bpm widget is more accurate
- importing audio is easier
- import audio from videos
- you can swipe between sections
- fixed a problem when sometimes koala would crash on start
- lots of little UI tweaks
- stability enhancements
Added choke groups

MIDI MAPPING UPDATE!!

* Midi map effects, transport, tempo sequence and some sample controls
* Hold and loop can both be enabled at the same time
* Custom background image chooser
* Edit a pad without triggering it (hold EDIT and press pad)
* Improved effects quality
* Added sort options for LOAD screen
* Fixed intermittent crash when exporting stems
* Landscape mode on iPhone
* Updated AudioBus library to latest version
* Enabled QWERTY keyboard shortcuts for iPad (same as the Mac ones)

MIDI MAPPING UPDATE!! (take 2)

* Midi map effects, transport, tempo sequence and some sample controls
* Hold and loop can both be enabled at the same time
* Custom background image chooser
* Edit a pad without triggering it (hold EDIT and press pad)
* Improved effects quality
* Added sort options for LOAD screen
* Fixed intermittent crash when exporting stems
* Landscape mode on iPhone
* Updated AudioBus library to latest version
* Enabled QWERTY keyboard shortcuts for iPad (same as the Mac ones)

MIDI MAPPING UPDATE!! (take 3)

* Midi map effects, transport, tempo sequence and some sample controls
* Hold and loop can both be enabled at the same time
* Custom background image chooser
* Edit a pad without triggering it (hold EDIT and press pad)
* Improved effects quality
* Added sort options for LOAD screen
* Fixed intermittent crash when exporting stems
* Landscape mode on iPhone
* Updated AudioBus library to latest version
* Enabled QWERTY keyboard shortcuts for iPad (same as the Mac ones)

and a few more things
- fixed a bug where some phones would get stuck when loading
- made sharing koala songs more stable
- made exporting much faster
- added midi velocity
- added a switch in settings to stop koala autotrimming the front of your sample if recording from microphone

* move your finger left and right to fine tune volume, pitch and pan.
* fixed some sample rate and tuning issues.
* koala now responds to midi start and stop messages
* optimized the graphics to improve performance on older devices
* memory optimization

- Much better waveform rendering
- Much optimized graphics for older devices
- fixed audio cutting out when returning from importing audio on some newer iPads

* fixes problems with AudioBus on iOS 14.3
* performance and stability fixes
* can now disable Audioshare if you want to just use Files app.

* now you can export individual samples, and export them edited or raw
* fixed a problem where koala was crashing for some instances when pressing the play button.
* fixed a problem where you lose the crop when normalizing.
- Samurai Edition in-app purchase now available - timestretch, sequence editing, autochop and more!

KOALA SAMURAI addendum
- Now all exporting is 24 bit
- Fixed crash when in airplane mode
- Export single loop lets you export stems
- Records in stereo again
- Fixed some clicking in auto-chop

- Setting to choose between 16 and 24 bit exported audio files
- Fixed exporting bug
- Fixed problem with Beats timestretch
- Stability and performance enhancements

- Made max attack length longer
- fixed problem where piano roll would pop up on single tap (samurai mode)
- Performance and stability fixes
Stability and performance enhancements
fixed song delete functionality

* better auto-save
* stability fixes

Fixed problem where sample-rate change when doing “modern” timestretch would make samples out of sync
Fixed problem where koala wasn’t auto-detecting hot-swapped midi devices
Fixed problem where FX hold wasn’t always being saved
Fixed problem with Ableton Set Export
Fixed a problem with the edit button
